content: What 1993 movie features Bill Murray reliving the same day over and over again until he learns important life lessons?

The 1993 movie you're referring to is "Groundhog Day." In this film, Bill Murray plays a weatherman named Phil Connors who finds himself reliving February 2nd repeatedly, the day of Groundhog Day, until he becomes a better person and learns to connect with others, particularly Rita, played by Andie MacDowell. The movie is a comedy but also explores themes of personal growth and the meaning of life.
